channel.title: Any Free FPS RPG's Out There?
channel.description: i'm looking for a free game that's an fps rpg (First Person Shooter Role Playing Game) not like a crossfire or combat arms kinda game but something like Fallout 3 or Dark Messiah...but legally free & Multiplayer

item.title: Any Free FPS RPG's Out There?
item.dc:creator: vivanto
item.description:
FO3 isn’t multiplayer tough.

What I meant on Hellgate was the online part, I know you had to buy the game, but iirc the servers were free, kinda like you buy Guild Wars and play for free. (and I know Hellgate sucked, didn’t need to play for that )

Tough I probably missed the whole op, as I was thinking of an fps mmo, rather than simply a multiplayer fps/rpg. In that case, just buy Borderlands.

Read full topic
item.source: Any Free FPS RPG's Out There?

item.title: Any Free FPS RPG's Out There?
